descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

triggerParamsNotice.displayName: Make sure the job is setup to support triggering with parameters. More info
triggerParamsNotice.name: triggerParamsNotice

job.name: job
job.description: Name of the job. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
job.ai_hint: Name of the job. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

param.name: param

values.name: name
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

param.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

newJob.name: newJob
newJob.description: Name of the new Jenkins job
newJob.ai_hint: Name of the new Jenkins job

createNotice.displayName: To get the XML of an existing job, add ‘config.xml’ to the end of the job URL
createNotice.name: createNotice

reason.name: reason
reason.description: Freeform reason for quiet down mode
reason.ai_hint: Freeform reason for quiet down mode

instanceNotice.displayName: Instance operation can shutdown Jenkins instance and make it unresponsive. Some commands may not be available depending on instance implementation.
instanceNotice.name: instanceNotice

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'job' AND operation == 'triggerParams' THEN SHOW parameter 'triggerParamsNotice'
IF resource == 'job' AND operation IN ["trigger", "triggerParams", "copy"] THEN SHOW parameter 'job'
IF resource == 'job' AND operation == 'triggerParams' THEN SHOW parameter 'param'
IF resource == 'job' AND operation IN ["copy", "create"] THEN SHOW parameter 'newJob'
IF resource == 'job' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'xml'
IF resource == 'job' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'createNotice'
IF resource == 'instance' AND operation == 'quietDown' THEN SHOW parameter 'reason'
IF resource == 'build' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'job'
IF resource == 'build' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'build' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
